1.title: Nighty Night

episode of.title: The Dose with Dr. Billy (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Dr. Billy Goldberg goes under the covers at a sleep center and explores the latest gadgets with his friend, actress Julianne Moore.

2.title: Never Forget

episode of.title: The Dose with Dr. Billy (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Forget much? See how memories are formed in the brain and master techniques for honing the ability to remember things.

imdb.plot outline: Get ready for your weekly dose of health tips -- with a quirky twist. Join physician Dr. Billy Goldberg as he takes an irreverent look at the most common real-life health complaints. From sleep to sugar, to memory and more, Dr. Billy demystifies health topics and provides real solutions anyone can understand.
imdb.title: The Dose with Dr. Billy
akas: The Dose with Dr. Billy (United States)
